name: 2048 (itch) (Occular Malice)
description:
Welcome to 2048. Connect the tiles to merge monsters!

To play the game, use the arrow keys or the W, A, S, and D keys on your keyboard. Press the up arrow or W to move the monsters up, the left arrow or A to move them left, the down arrow or S to move them down, and the right arrow or D to move them right. All the monsters on the grid will move in the direction you press.

When two monsters of the same type collide, they will merge into a single monster of the next level. For example, two level 1 monsters will combine to form a level 2 monster, two level 2 monsters will combine to form a level 3 monster, and so on.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Ryan Laley Games Spring Jam in April of 2023.

The original 2048 game is a puzzle game created by Gabriele Cirulli, an Italian web developer, in March 2014.
